channel.title: Webclient
channel.description:
How can i make a webclient? and do i need a proper domain like pkloldie.com or what ever or can it be something like pkloldie.smfforfree3.com or pkloldie.smfnew.com or etc and just make webclient on home page can someone please help i have msn teamviewer etc all that i really need help thanks in advance.
Pkloldie.

item.title: Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Hypocryte Hypocryte
item.description:
@Hypocryte wrote:

[quote=“Spirit Coder, post:6, topic:330531”][quote author=Hypocryte link=topic=426907.msg3135417#msg3135417 date=1266901019]

Domains must be purchased, along with hosting for the domains.
To make a webclient, jar and sign your webclient, put it on your webclient, and make a html file to run it.
[/quote]You could always be a cheapskate and host it on your own IP address, of course. Maybe point a dynamic DNS towards it.

That’s if they are poor, like you.

No offence intended.

Not everyone has enough money to paying monthly for something that should be free in the first place.

Or you can go on google type dot tk or co.cc or co.nr wich are free domains it may not be a .com or .net but it’s sorten then .smfforfree[/quote]
Yes but free DNS sites like that mask your site URL so you cannot add anything past the trailing slash. Posting links to topics would be quite a process.

Read full topic
